features: Odor-Fighting Intimate Wash: Say goodbye to unwanted odors with this specialized ball wash for men. Our formula targets odor-causing bacteria, especially in intimate areas, keeping you feeling and smelling fresh all day.

Elevate Men's Hygiene: Experience a new standard in men's intimate care with ANDRE SEALS Male Intimate Wash. Perfectly pH-balanced to suit the unique needs of men, ensuring you stay fresh and confident.

Soothing Care for Daily and Intimate Use: Experience the dual benefits of Vitamin E and Organic Jojoba Oil for soothing skin nourishment, ideal for both daily freshness and sensitive foreskin hygiene. Our formula provides comfort and effective cleansing for all intimate moments.

Natural Ingredients for Gentle Care: Enriched with Organic Aloe Vera Juice and essential oils like Tea Tree and Cedarwood, our Intimate Soap (jabon intimo para hombre) provides a deep yet gentle cleanse, respecting your skin's natural balance.
Empower Your Intimate Moments: Stay ready for life's intimate moments. ANDRE SEALS Male Intimate Wash has you covered, providing cleanliness and confidence when it matters most.
body.description: Harnessing Nature for Your Personal Care Our unique formula taps into the potent properties of Organic Aloe Vera Juice, Tea Tree, Cedarwood, and Lemon Essential Oils, each specifically chosen for their suitability in men's skincare. Enriched with Vitamin E and Jojoba Oil, it not only cleanses but also nourishes, ensuring a balanced, refreshed feeling. Designed with the modern man in mind, this wash offers a natural approach to maintaining daily freshness and combating common skin concerns in intimate areas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It makes my smell way better
reviews.reviewText: My used to smell like a death fish now that smell is gone with this product is great. I will definitely buy it again. I will probably get a different scent next time. I like this scent but I want to try a different one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars "A Soothing Experience with Andre Seals Mens Hygiene Intimate Wash"
reviews.reviewText: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐"I must share how impressed I am with the Andre Seals Mens Hygiene Intimate Wash. Being a first-time user, I found the wash to be particularly soothing, leaving a comfortable, cool sensation. It seems quite gentle on my skin and surprisingly moisturizing – no signs of dryness or discomfort so far. I also appreciate how it leaves me feeling fresh and clean throughout the day. I've used it consistently over the past few weeks with no hint of a rash or irritation. It's certainly a keeper for me, and I would recommend it to others seeking a dependable and gentle intimate wash."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice fragrance. Very masculine. I was very surprised by the large amount of lather this body wash produces with a small amount. Great for the male genitalia area. Too small amount for the price. Would like a larger bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent and long lasting
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a product that would get rid of funky sack. This stuff exceeded my hopes, and I am very happy with how it works. It smells great and has a masculine scent. As it has been said on a different TV ad, she will like it too. Five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hace el trabajo pero perdí la mitad del jabón antes de recibirlo
reviews.reviewText: Muy buena fragancia, no obstante. El empaque de seguridad llegó roto y se perdió la mitad del producto, el cual vino todo esparcido dentro de la caja de envío.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped with neutralizing sweat odor
reviews.reviewText: This is the fourth time I've used this product. For this reason, I can now write how great this product has worked on my body. I have struggled my whole life with excessive sweating and odors from this problems. It's been hard for me to actually find products that help in my situation of sweating and smelling. This product has improved my overall situation by neutralizing odors during the entire day by using it in the mornings when getting ready and at night when showering before going to bed. Highly recommend the product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband loved it, it smells fresh and lasts quite a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh body fresh mind
reviews.reviewText: I have a job that takes me from town to town talking to people. This soap keeps my body fresh without any odor regardless of outside temperature and my tremendous perspiration. if my body is fresh my mind is clear. I Highly recommend it.
